title: I really don't understand why everyone complains about the new client...
body:
the moment it launches the first time and complaining about wanting to change it back

When i loaded my patcher for the first time on the preseason patch it ASKED ME if i wanted to start using the new client. 
I said no, it now launches the old client every single time i open the game.

Why does everyone complain so much about this? I don't understand.
